page.title: 08 BEBINGTON RECREATION
page.content: The impression of the area is that land cover consists of{suburban {estates}and{'tended land',}much of it is playing fields and{recreation {grounds.} Two main roads, Old Chester Rd and Kings Rd, run roughly from South-East to North-West and have various clusters of shops beside them at important road junctions. The recreation grounds are a notable feature, but only one, the{Oval,}is really significant. Its 1920's plan and buildings led it to be featured in the recent successful{film "Chariots {of Fire."} It is of significance to the whole{Wirral area,}not simply to the immediate locality, and its race track and indoor swimming pool are facilities frequently used by local schools.
